title: This is the last 24 hours on my fantastic phone......
content:
Crashed upon loading YouTube on TV

3 second latency on keyboard text for almost 10 minutes

Crashed YouTube three times in one hour car trip

Failed to load GrubHub and froze.  

Deleted entire paragraph in Gmail for no reason

Three voice text deleted after completion

Gmail locking up and crashing.  The same f****** company that makes these phones shameful

Phone randomly froze on a Google image search and then started to repeatedly bring the drop-down menu over and over till I had to restart

One second latency on all key presses for the last hour

Turning Bluetooth on just crash entire phone while needing GPS for a crucial turn which cause 20 minutes to my trip.  I can't even make this s*** up it happens every time.

Google search bar unresponsive with full bars 

Gmail won't load freezes locks out blank screen.  How can gmail not work on a Google phone?

3 second latency on keyboard again yay right when I'm busy at work f*** this phone ughhhhhh!!!!!!!!!

Unplugging or plugging into charger crashes phone
